title:
Alphabet (GOOG) Earnings Preview: GOOG Stock Likely To Trade Lower Due To 
Weak FY 2023Q4 Results With ...
text:
Alphabet (GOOG) Likely To Miss Revenues And Earnings Expectations  GOOG Earnings Estimates For FY 2023Q3  Alphabet Quarterly Revenue, EPS & Stock Price History  Earnings View vs. Long Term View =>  Earnings view represents near term view based on likely market reaction post earnings =>  This near term view may or may not coincide with long-term view which is more grounded in fundamentals and long-term growth =>  In case of GOOG, our near term view and long-term view conflict =>  Near term view: stock could trade lower | Long-term view: stock likely to not move much  What Next?  (1) Understand methodology behind long-term view on GOOG Valuation better  (2) Learn more about Alphabet to understand its investment potential better  (3) Compare performance and potential of GOOG against its peers and key investment themes  (4) Single stock can be risky, invest with our portfolios that have significantly outperformed S&P 500 in the last few years  More from Trefis Alphabet Insights Alphabet better betsAlphabet counter-intuitive comparisonAlphabet peer comparisonComplete analyses on Alphabet (GOOG) stockLatest analyses on all stocksComparison of Bear Markets of the S&P500 Invest in Market-Beating Trefis Portfolios Multi-Strategy Portfolio: 322% Return Since 2016 vs. 118% for S&P 500Reserve Your Spot to Invest with Trefis Portfolios ©Copyright 2019 Insight Guru Inc.
